title: Who is a better singer, Luke Bryan or Luke Combs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Certainly depends on exactly what you mean by singer. As entertainers, vocalists, artists, etc… Vocally, Luke Combs possesses way more emotion in his voice and his songs are usually quite impressive lyrically. Luke Bryan is undoubtedly a top notch performer and entertainer though.

Luke Combs hits every not exactly as it should be. His pitch is perfect. Luke Bryan is not pitchy at all, but songs a lot of songs that do not require great technique. they are both great singer. I think it is a tie.
